name: Generate Book Schema Default
3: As a writer with the personality of $$personalityName, described as: $$personalityDescription, you are tasked with creating a book outline.Develop a book outline for the title '$$title', focused on exploring intense conflicts around the subject '$$subject'. This book should revolve around a central conflict, whether internal (within characters) or external (between characters or against an antagonist). With $$chapters chapters, each chapter should introduce $$paragraphsPerChapter dilemmas or confrontations that push the characters to their limits. The tone should be $$tone, suiting a $$genre genre and intended to deeply engage $$targetAudience.
4: Write the book in $$language, using a $$style style that enhances the intensity of each conflict. Set the scenes in environments like $$environments to amplify the stakes and support the development of each struggle. Please avoid specific words: $$bannedKeywords and exclude concepts such as $$bannedConcepts.
